text: [MUSIC PLAYING]

It's been a
phenomenal six months.

The fellowship definitely
helps us as entrepreneurs
to take the first leap of faith.

X-COR Therapeutics is a
medical device company

creating a novel platform
for removing CO2 out
of patient bloodstreams.

The second half
of this fellowship

is really geared
towards acceleration.

We have science that's proven
in a preclinical data set

and approved by
experts in the field.

Now it's time for us to
accelerate through our first
in human trials.

Our product is really
going to change our market

and change the care
pathway for our patients.

And they see us as kind of
the beachhead for that change

and are really open
to working with us.

I can't say enough for
Peter's mentorship.

He's the one who takes
several hours out of his week

in order to sit with
us, do monthly updates,

listen to how we've
performed our work,
and give us slight nudges.
[MUSIC PLAYING]
